quotes.quote: Ballet is created on beautiful lines and shapes. If what you hear and what you see mesh, there's a very thrilling experience.

quotes.quote: It's a gutter ballet / Just a menagerie / Still the orchestra plays / On a dark and lonely night / To a distant fading light.
